name: Chapter 13: Sabotage
short_description: As Sarah works to implement her Grand Theory, the radical group sabotages her efforts, causing magical disturbances across the city. Sarah must race against time to prevent a catastrophic magical meltdown while defending her work and principles.
events: Sabotage attempts, magical disturbances, Sarah's efforts to prevent disaster
people: Sarah, her team, radical group members, city officials
from_prev_chapter: Escalating conflict between Sarah and the radical group
to_next_chapter: The final confrontation and resolution of the magi-tech crisis
